discussion.p: `std::dynamic_extent` can be used in certain circumstances in `std::mdspan`, such as with padded layouts. However, `std::dynamic_extent` is currently only defined in <span> which necessitates including <span> solely for the `std::dynamic_extent` definition.
Set priority to 3 after reflector poll.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after eight votes in favour during reflector poll.

blockquote.p: The header <span> () defines the view `span`. The header <mdspan> () defines the class template `mdspan` and other facilities for interacting with these multidimensional views.

p.ins: -?- In addition to being available via inclusion of the <span> header, `dynamic_extent` is available when the header <mdspan> is included.
